attributes.action: Save Grantham A&E - we need it to reopen 24/7
attributes.background: From Wednesday 17th August 2016 United Lincolnshire Hospital Trust have closed our A&E department- As a community we all feel saddened by this, we feel we need everyone's support in regaining full services back to our A&E

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of United Lincolnshire Hospitals NHS Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament.
